items.urgency_message: If the leak is steady, shut off the supply valves to prevent damage.
items.safety_tip: Turn off water supply before disassembly.
items.prep_tip: Clear under-sink area and take a photo of the faucet.

items.urgency_message: If the sink is leaking underneath, stop using it until inspected.
items.safety_tip: Shut off water and verify no leaks before restoring service.
items.prep_tip: Measure sink opening and bring link/photo of the sink you want.

items.urgency_message: Active roof leaks can cause electrical hazards and moldâ€”cover items and contain drips now.
items.safety_tip: Avoid attic contact with wet wiring; shut off circuit if water is near lights/outlets.
items.prep_tip: Send photos of the ceiling stain and roof area if possible.
